attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am adopting a child from China have already applied and paid for the fees for
the USCIS 1600-A form and fingerprints. I understand you need to raise your
application rates. Everything is increasing these days and you have a right to
cover your costs.. I strongly urge you to have a clause that "granfathers"
those of us who have already paid, but because of the extended wait times, will
have to reapply and not only pay your fees again, but now we will have to pay
the increase. International adoption is an expensive endeavor and makes it
difficult for some of us to afford this tremendous opportunity. I hope you will
consider those who have to now pay this fee a second time.

I appreciate your consideration in this matter and for allowing us to make
comments regarding the changes in your fee structure.

Best regards, Emily Gwynn

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Emily F. Gwynn
